com.mapgroup.classificator.database.dao

Class DbAccessWithUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapgroup.classificator.database.dao.DbAccess
      • com.mapgroup.classificator.database.dao.DbAccessWithUser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MySQLAccess, PostgreSQLAccess

    abstract class DbAccessWithUser
extends DbAccess
    Provides utility to handle a connection with a generic DBMS that supports the creation of users.

      Creates the user with the information in the class' fields.

      Checks if the user already exists.
      protected void initDatabase()
      Loads the driver of the DBMS, initializes the database (creating it if it does not exists) and initializing the user (creating it if it does not exists).

    • Method Detail

      • createUser

        protected abstract void createUser(java.sql.Statement s)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates the user with the information in the class' fields.
        Parameters:
        s - Statement by which the query are executed
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the creation fails

      • existUser

        protected abstract boolean existUser()
        Checks if the user already exists.
        Returns:
        true if the user exists, false otherwise

      • initDatabase

        protected void initDatabase()
                     throws DataException,
                            IncorrectLoginException
        Loads the driver of the DBMS, initializes the database (creating it if it does not exists) and initializing the user (creating it if it does not exists).
        Overrides:
        initDatabase in class DbAccess
        Throws:
        DataException - if database can not be correctly created
        IncorrectLoginException - if login to the DBMS fails
